I taught the undergraduate courses on public international law, constitutional law, international investment law, and international intellectual property law. My research and professional work relates to a plethora of issues of public international law inter alia sources of international law, international humanitarian law, international criminal law, third world approaches to international law (TWAIL), Bangladesh’s framework of engagement with international law, history of international law, and international economic law. I also selected, coached and advised the team participating in the Jessup International Law Moot Court Competition.', 'title': 'Senior Lecturer', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'School of Law, BRAC University', 'description': None, 'title': 'Lecturer', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 264431, 'name': 'International Criminal Court', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQEiMaKxRFVe5A/company-logo_400_400/0/1626421994588?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=ONr6QgCib8trVCn7wnUbUHSj2ZNnmhVOxlJzBhMRTVc', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/international-criminal-court---cour-p-nale-internationale/', 'employees': {'start': 501, 'end': 1000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': 'International Criminal Court', 'description': 'I conducted legal research for counsels and aided in the drafting of submissions on issues of public international law, international criminal law, and international humanitarian law relating to ongoing proceedings before all chambers of the Court. As part of the OPCV team legally representating victims, I have researched issues and aided in the preparation of submissions in proceedings relating to multiple cases, namely: Alfred Yekatom and Patrice-Edouard Ngaïssona; Blé Goudé; Bosco Ntaganda; Dominic Ongwen; Situation in Palestine; and Situation on Registered Vessels of Comoros, the Hellenic Republic and Cambodia.

In relation to the aforesaid proceedings I also prepared research dossiers on numerous issues, inter alia, statehood, territorial jurisdiction, reparations, United Nations law, status of former child soldiers, standards of evidence, and fair trial standards.

I had also produced a detailed research and briefing dossier on the Situation in Myanmar/Bangladesh which included the history of the situation in Rakhine, the culture, and the legal and evidentiary issues relating to the alleged atrocities in Rakhine, Myanmar.', 'title': 'Legal Professional', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Commonwealth Human Rights Initiative, London', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'company': 'Commonwealth Human Rights Initiative, London', 'description': 'I conducted research on LGBTQI issues on a global scale, primarily identifying and analysing issues to map the status of and barriers to LGBTQI rights across the nations in the Commonwealth.', 'title': 'Researcher', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'UNDP Justice Sector Facility Project, School of Law, BRAC University', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'company': 'UNDP Justice Sector Facility Project, School of Law, BRAC University', 'description': 'I worked on a UNDP funded Justice Sector Facility Project, which synthesized, mapped and categorized knowledge on projects undertaken to develop the justice sector and human rights in Bangladesh.
